com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc

Class RedstoneTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.RedstoneTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class RedstoneTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Keeps track of Redstone Power for signs, raising proper Sign redstone events in the process
